revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Android 4.0 Mini PC |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = RikoMagic |model = MK802 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = + |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Android media player |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A10s; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv7-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9GBG08U0A-SCB0; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83CFR-H9C; |ram1chipmodelfull = 4 |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.0.8;Android 4.0.4;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Mini HDMI output, Micro SD Card slot, microphone |addchip = Enhanced PMIC;X-Powers;AXP152;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Semitime <!-- Technology Co --> |manuf_model = ST-G2 |manuf_rev = S-VER:1.0 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 12/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 1204196286579 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Fn-Link FN-8900M |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8189ES; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = soldered |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2012/10/23" and "ST-GS S-VER:1.0" are silkscreened on board bottom.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A10s @1.0GHz ARM (Cortex-A8) *GPU: ARM Mali-400 @300MHz *Memory: 1GB DDR3 SDRAM *Storage: 4GB NAND Flash, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Wi-Fi: [[Realtek]] RTL8189ES (802.11bgn) *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (Host), 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *Power: 5V, 2A via Mini USB
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Android_Mini_PC_MK802 ''Android Mini PC MK802'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Rikomagic_mk802%2B ''Rikomagic MK802+'' on '''Linux-Sunxi'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Semitime_g2 ''Semitime g2'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''']
===Wi-Fi Chipset TV Sticks=== :'''[[Allwinner]] A10''' (Cortex-A8) *[[RikoMagic MK802]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8188CTV • [https://linux-sunxi.org/Rikomagic_mk802 L-S] *RikoMagic MK802 II - [[Realtek]] RTL8188CUS • [https://linux-sunxi.org/Rikomagic_mk802ii L-S] *RikoMagic MK802 IV - [[Realtek]] RTL8188CUS *[[RikoMagic MK802+]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8189ES • [https://linux-sunxi.org/Rikomagic_mk802%2B L-S]
:'''[[Rockchip]] RK3066''' (Cortex-A9) *[[RikoMagic MK802 III]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8188EUS *RikoMagic MK802 IIIS - [[Mediatek]] MT5931/MT6622 (BT 2.1) *Tronsmart CX803 II - [[Realtek]] RTL8189ES *[[RikoMagic MK806]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4329 (WiFi)/BCM40181 (BT) • Rockchip RK901 *[[RikoMagic MK808]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4329 (WiFi)/BCM40181 (BT) • Rockchip RK901 *RikoMagic MK808B - [[Broadcom]] BCM4330 (WiFi)/BCM40183 (BT 3.0) • Rockchip RK903 *[[RikoMagic MK809]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8188EUS *RikoMagic MK809 II - [[Mediatek]] MT5931/MT6622 (BT 2.1)
:'''[[Rockchip]] RK3188''' (Cortex-A9) *RikoMagic MK809 III/IV - [[Realtek]] RTL8188CUS/[[MediaTek]] MT5931 *Tronsmart MK908 - [[Broadcom]] BCM4329 • [[AMPAK]] AP6210 (2.4GHz + BT)
